caption: An energetic indie rock track driven by a clean, catchy electric guitar riff and a punchy, straightforward drum and bass groove. The male lead vocal is clear and powerful, delivering an anthemic melody that soars during the high-energy chorus. The arrangement follows a classic verse-chorus structure, punctuated by a brief, melodic guitar break and a dynamic bridge that builds back into a final, powerful chorus before concluding with the initial guitar riff.
lyrics:
[Intro - Guitar Riff]

[Verse 1]
Woke up in the electric city, bright light
Neon signs and shadows we ignite
Stepping to the beat, feel the heart race
Life's a wild ride in this endless place

[Pre-Chorus]
Synths and bass, they carry us above
Funk rhythms mixed with electric love
Drums pounding loud in the crowded street
Guitar strings strum to our moving feet

[Chorus]
Turn it up, feel the electric heartbeat
Every pulse bringing us to our feet
Dance through the night, we're invincible
Electric heartbeat, unstoppable

[Instrumental Break - Guitar Riff]

[Verse 2]
City lights flicker in a rhythmic trance
Under moon's glow, we take a chance
Voices harmonize in a primal scream
Every note a spark, fueling our dream

[Pre-Chorus]
Feel the rush, let it take control
Electric fire burning in our soul
No turning back, we're lost in the sound
In this moment, forever unbound

[Chorus]
Turn it up, feel the electric heartbeat
Every pulse bringing us to our feet
Dance through the night, we're invincible
Electric heartbeat, unstoppable

[Outro - Guitar Riff and Drums]
[abrupt silence]
